abstract: The keyboard comes in jet black and has blue L.E.D. backlights that cast an eerie glow through and around the keys.
snippet: The keyboard comes in jet black and has blue L.E.D. backlights that cast an eerie glow through and around the keys.
lead_paragraph: Any athlete will tell you that the difference between winning the silver and the gold is often raw talent, but good equipment can give anyone that extra push. That is what Microsoft is hoping to prove with its new Reclusa keyboard, created in collaboration with the gaming company Razer.

headline.main: A Keyboard Made for Those in Need of a ‘Kill Aliens’ Command
headline.print_headline: A Keyboard Made for Those in Need of a ‘Kill Aliens’ Command

abstract: Circulating online, the thoughts of an employee who’s worked at both places, comparing the offices, pay and perks.
snippet: Circulating online, the thoughts of an employee who’s worked at both places, comparing the offices, pay and perks.
lead_paragraph: The perks at Google have long been the talk of Silicon Valley and beyond. But when all is said and done, how do they stack up against the perks at Microsoft? And which is the better workplace?

headline.main: Google v. Microsoft: What’s the Better Workplace?
